channel.title: translate on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in translate on Just a Memo

item.title: Linux 命令行字典
item.description: 网络字典（推荐） Install $ sudo emerge -avq app-i18n/translate-shell Config %filename: .translate-shell/init.trans { :tl ["zh-CN"] :user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/63.0" :proxy "http://192.168.0.199:8087" } USE trans en:zh good trans good trans zh:en 好 trans -x http://192.168.0.199:8087 good 本地中文字典 Install emerge -avq app-text/sdcv To install a dictionary, first create the /usr/share/stardict/dic directory, if it does not exist. After that,
